file_content.text: They're lazy, they're stupid, they complain all the time....
We'd be better off with droids. Get a lot more done.
Why are they even still here? Hey, bog-rats! Not your planet anymore! Get lost and stop wasting our time!
I'm telling you: the new Czerka labor models. They don't stink, you don't have to feed 'em, and they all understand Basic and Huttese.
